Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Southbound Reroute near North Blvd/Forest Ave
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at 51st/St Lawrence
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Prairie, 49th, King Drive and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/St Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Prairie, 49th, King Drive and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/St Lawrence.

Headline: Blue and Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue and Pink Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue and Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park- bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delay following an earlier sick customer at Clinton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delay following an earlier sick customer at Clinton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
